description.english: Complete the tutorial
description.french: Terminez le tutoriel.
description.italian: Completa il tutorial
description.spanish: Completa el tutorial
description.schinese: 已完成教程
description.tchinese: 完成教學
description.japanese: チュートリアルを完了する

description.english: Upgrade a tower to stone
description.french: Améliorez une tour en tour en pierre.
description.italian: Potenzia una torre in pietra
description.spanish: Mejora una torre a piedra
description.schinese: 将一座塔楼升级为石制塔楼
description.tchinese: 將一座塔升級成石塔
description.japanese: 塔を石材にアップグレードする
description.polish: Ulepsz wieżę do jej kamiennej wersji

description.english: Own a command tower with 5 floors
description.french: Possédez une tour de commandement de 5 étages.
description.italian: Entra in possesso di una torre di comando con 5 piani
description.spanish: Consigue una torre de mando de 5 pisos
description.schinese: 拥有一座5层楼的指挥塔
description.tchinese: 擁有一座五層樓的指揮塔
description.japanese: 5フロアの司令塔を所有する

description.english: Own a 2nd outpost
description.french: Possédez un 2e avant-poste.
description.italian: Entra in possesso di un secondo avamposto
description.spanish: Consigue un 2.º puesto de avanzada
description.schinese: 已拥有第2座哨所
description.tchinese: 擁有一座第二前哨站
description.japanese: 2つめの前哨拠点を所有する

description.english: Reach a single resource extractor output of 20
description.german: Erreiche eine Extraktor-Produktion von 20 für eine einzelne Ressource
description.french: Atteignez un rendement d'extracteur de ressources unique de 20.
description.italian: Raggiungi 20 produzioni di un singolo estrattore di risorse
description.koreana: 단일 자원 추출 시설 생산량 20 달성
description.spanish: Alcanza una producción de 20 con un solo extractor de recursos
description.schinese: 一座资源采掘器产出达到20
description.tchinese: 單一資源精煉廠達到輸出量20
description.japanese: 1つの資源抽出機の産出量を20にする
description.polish: Osiągnij produkcję pojedynczego obiektu wydobywczego na poziomie 20

description.english: Have 10 Captains within your retinue at one time
description.german: Habe zu einem Zeitpunkt 10 Kapitäne im Gefolge
description.french: Ayez 10 capitaines à la fois dans votre suite.
description.italian: Ingaggia contemporaneamente 10 capitani
description.spanish: Ten 10 capitanes a tus órdenes al mismo tiempo
description.schinese: 麾下同时拥有10名船长
description.tchinese: 在你的手下內一次擁有10名船長
description.japanese: 一度に10人の船長を配下に持つ

description.english: Have 10 Commanders within your retinue at one time
description.german: Habe zu einem Zeitpunkt 10 Kommandanten im Gefolge
description.french: Ayez 10 commandants à la fois dans votre suite.
description.italian: Ingaggia contemporaneamente 10 comandanti
description.spanish: Ten 10 comandantes a tus órdenes al mismo tiempo
description.schinese: 麾下同时拥有10名指挥官
description.tchinese: 在你的手下內一次擁有10名指揮官
description.japanese: 一度に10人の指揮官を配下に持つ

description.english: Own a command tower with 14 floors

description.italian: Entra in possesso di una torre di comando con 14 livelli
description.spanish: Consigue una torre de mando de 14 pisos

description.english: Own 10 outposts within one settlement
